Áká Franklin bụ ihe nkiri Canada nkè Frank Wolf méré n'afọ 2015 nke na-eso otu mmadụ anọ na-anwa ịkwọ ụgbọ mmiri Northwest Passage iji mee ka mgbanwe ihu igwe dị na Arctic pụta ìhè. Ihe nkiri ahụ meriri ihe nrite màkà 'Best Documentary Feature' n'afọ 2016 Ramunas Atelier International Film Awards, meriri màkà 'Best Canadian Film' n'afọ 2015 Vancouver International Mountain Film Festival (VIMFF) wee merie 'Adventure Award' n'afọ 2016 San Francisco International Ocean Film Festival. Ọ na-egosipụta egwu nke Peirson Ross, The Cyrillic Typewriter, Sylvia Cloutier na Madeleine Allakariallak ma na-agbasa na Canada na ọwa CBC.
